title: Year after COVID hit Italy, 3rd wave of infections sending most of country into new lockdown
content:
1. Year after COVID hit Italy, 3rd wave of infections sending most of country into new lockdown  CBS News
  2. Italy to impose nationwide coronavirus lockdown over Easter weekend  Reuters
  3. Italian government approves strict new Covid measures as cases rise  The Guardian
  4. Most of Italy ordered under partial lockdown to stem new Covid-19 wave  FRANCE 24 English
  5. Italy Covid Lockdown: Draghi Cabinet to Meet to Weigh Tightening Measures  Bloomberg
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: COVID侵袭意大利一年后，第三波感染潮使意大利大部分地区进入新的封锁状态。
COVID侵襲意大利一年後，第三波感染潮使意大利大部分地區進入新的封鎖狀態。
